event.logmsg: The Node with Id: %nodeid%; ForeignSource: %parm[foreignSource]%; ForeignId:%parm[foreignId]% has address information which should be converted to coordintes, but the Geocoding Service is disabled.

event.event-label: OpenNMS-defined internal event: address resolution successful
event.logmsg: The address resolution for node with id %nodeid% (ForeignSource: %parm[foreignSource]%, ForeignId: %parm[foreignId]%) was successful.

event.event-label: OpenNMS-defined internal event: address resolution failed
event.logmsg: The address resolution for node with id %nodeid% (ForeignSource: %parm[foreignSource]%, ForeignId: %parm[foreignId]%) failed. Reason: %parm[reason]%
